text: Andinosaura laevis, the shiny lightbulb lizard, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Colombia. ==References== Category:Andinosaura Category:Reptiles of Colombia Category:Endemic fauna of Colombia Category:Reptiles described in 1908 Category:Taxa named by George Albert Boulenger
title: Andinosaura laevis
